Element.Name: UBL version identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the version of syntax that transactions are based on.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Transaction identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the pre-award catalogue request that allows referencing the pre-award catalogue request.

Element.Name: Version
Element.Description: An identifier for the version of a transaction message.

Element.Name: Economic operator
Element.Description: The contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or public works using a tendering procedure as described in the applicable directive .

Element.Name: Economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or post code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision code
Element.Description: A code that identifies a subdivision of a country, e.,g., a province or district.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: The main line in an address.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line
